pr_title: Optimize MetadataQueryOptimizer with filter pushdown enabled

timeline.message: Move metadata query optimizer after connector optimizers
Move metadata query optimizer after connector optimizers
Move metadata query optimizer after connector optimizers
Move metadata query optimizer after connector optimizers
Move metadata query optimizer after connector optimizers
Fix metadata query optimizer with filter pushdown

Optimize MetadataQueryOptimizer with filter pushdown enabled

When hive.pushdown_filter_enabled is true, TableScanNode would
not be aware of table layout until connector plan optimizer finished
one pass. This would lead to inefficiency in MetadataQueryOptimizer
as it would try to get all the partitions of the table.

To optimize it, we moved MetadataQueryOptimizer after first connector
query optimizer run, and fixed the optimizer so it could adapt to
the layout after filter pushdown.

Optimize MetadataQueryOptimizer with filter pushdown enabled

When hive.pushdown_filter_enabled is true, TableScanNode would
not be aware of table layout until connector plan optimizer finished
one pass. This would lead to inefficiency in MetadataQueryOptimizer

To optimize it, we moved MetadataQueryOptimizer after first connector
query optimizer run, and fixed the optimizer so it could adapt to
the layout after filter pushdown.

To optimize it, we moved MetadataQueryOptimizer after first connector

the layout after filter pushdown.

timeline.author: highker

replies.bodyText: Good point. toStringAscii comes first in Intellij auto-complete 🙃
replies.author: shixuan-fan

timeline.message:
Fix ValuesMatcher

- Fix StringLiteral generation by creating string instead of using
toString value of Slice, which only includes base/address/length.
- Use Set instead of List for expected rows. The row sequence does not
impact correctness.

Optimize MetadataQueryOptimizer with filter pushdown enabled

When hive.pushdown_filter_enabled is true, TableScanNode would
not be aware of table layout until connector plan optimizer finished
one pass. This would lead to inefficiency in MetadataQueryOptimizer
as it would try to get all the partitions of the table.

To optimize it, we moved MetadataQueryOptimizer after first connector
query optimizer run, and fixed the optimizer so it could adapt to
the layout after filter pushdown.
